holidays.title: National Cherries Jubilee Day
holidays.description: We invite you to join us in indulging in this most dramatic of desserts.

holidays.title: Ancestors' Day
holidays.description: It is Pchum Ben and time to feed the hungry ghosts of our ancestors.

holidays.title: Bluebird of Happiness Day
holidays.description: Bluebirds are also known as the harbingers of happiness.

holidays.title: Family Health & Fitness Day USA
holidays.description: A day that promotes physical activity and health with your loved ones.

holidays.title: Fish Amnesty Day
holidays.description: Fish deserve as much affection and protection as other vertebrates.

holidays.title: Heritage Day
holidays.description: A day that celebrates South Africa’s roots, their rich, vibrant, and diverse cultures.

holidays.title: Innergize Day
holidays.description: Forget your troubles, and ease into the tranquil spirit of the autumn season.

holidays.title: International Lace Day
holidays.description: Get ready to celebrate this skill that has been practiced for centuries.

holidays.title: International Rabbit Day
holidays.description: Get ready to celebrate our fluffy rabbit friends this International Rabbit Day!

holidays.title: International Rabbit Day
holidays.description: Let’s get to know a bit more about how our cute woodland friends got their holiday.

holidays.title: Lash Stylists’ Day
holidays.description: Call your eyelash stylist and get ready because it’s Lash Stylists’ Day!

holidays.title: National Bunny Day
holidays.description: What's up, doc? National Bunny Day promotes healthy environments for raising bunnies as pets.

holidays.title: National Ghost Hunting Day
holidays.description: It’s the day of the spookies!

holidays.title: National Horchata Day
holidays.description: This day has been set aside to indulge in the creamy deliciousness that is horchata.

holidays.title: National Hunting and Fishing Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the outdoor activities of hunting and fishing while emphasizing conservation.

holidays.title: National Mofongo Day
holidays.description: Get your taste buds ready to dive deep into all the flavors of this beloved cuisine.

holidays.title: National Public Lands Day
holidays.description: Appreciate the beauty of our environment and attend events that bring us together.

holidays.title: National Punctuation Day
holidays.description: “Let’s eat, Grandma!” or “Let’s eat Grandma!” — it’s clear that punctuation saves lives.

holidays.title: National Seat Check Saturday
holidays.description: Before you go on a family road trip, be sure to check your child’s car seat.

holidays.title: Our Lady of Mercedes Day
holidays.description: Dominicans celebrate Our Lady of Mercedes Day with processions and church ceremonies.

holidays.title: Pchum Ben
holidays.description: Pchum Ben marks the start of the journey of souls to purgatory.

holidays.title: Save Your Photos Day
holidays.description: Bring out your albums and digital archives and let's get ready to preserve our photos.

holidays.title: Schwenkfelder Thanksgiving
holidays.description: This is the longest-continually celebrated Thanksgiving in America.

holidays.title: World Bollywood Day
holidays.description: Release your inner Shah Rukh Khan or Priyanka Chopra!

holidays.title: DJ Ghost’s Birthday
holidays.description: This YouTuber has become well-known in the hip-hop scene for his commentary.

holidays.title: Hannah Brown’s Birthday
holidays.description: Patience is the key and the sky is the limit for this American television star.

holidays.title: Sierra Furtado’s Birthday
